# See https://github.com/check-spelling/check-spelling/wiki/Configuration-Examples:-excludes
(?:^|/)(?i)COPYRIGHT
(?:^|/)(?i)LICEN[CS]E
(?:^|/)package(?:-lock|)\.json$
(?:^|/)vendor/
ignore$
\.lock$
\.min\.
\.mod$
^docs/CNAME$
^refs/csswg\.json$
^refs/etsi\.json$
^refs/ietf\.json$
^refs/wg21\.json$
^test/ref-list\.json$
^\.github/
